detail_desc: Blouse in an airy pattern weave with a round neck, concealed button placket and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with flared cuffs and ties, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Romper suit in a cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, buttons down the front, elastication at the top of the back and elasticated hems.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Reversible bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets at the front, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Knee-length sports shorts in woven fabric with elastication and an inner drawstring at the waist and discreet side pockets.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Long-sleeved lace top with an opening and ties at the back of the neck and gathers in the sides for best fit. Lined.

Shirt in checked cotton flannel containing glittery threads with a collar, pearly press-studs down the front and a lace yoke at the back and over the shoulders. Chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length denim trousers with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem, and a slit at the front of the hems.
Short skirt in printed stretch denim with worn details, a concealed, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Tunic in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, smocked section around the neckline and buttons down the front. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front, diagonal fastening with press-studs down the front and down one leg and full feet with elasticated heels.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Calf-length skirt in a soft jacquard weave with a sheen and a zip in the side. Several flounces on one side and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Shirts woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Imitation suede sandals with a small platform and covered heels. Thin straps around the top and a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Straight-cut dress in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the back and raglan sleeves decorated with gathered frills.
Knitted jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Waterproof, warm-lined hi-top boots in fabric with imitation leather and grosgrain details. Padded shaft with an imitation leather appliqué, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Plastic smartphone case with a transparent back and coloured trims.

STUDIO COLLECTION. High platform boots in leather with square toes, a flatlock seam down the front and a zip in one side. Twill linings, leather insoles and leather soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Short coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Dress in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline, sewn-on bow at the top and short sleeves.
Double-breasted jacket in bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut, sleeveless V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces at the front.
Clutch bag with a detachable metal chain shoulder strap, open inner compartment and flap with a decorative metal buckle and concealed magnetic fastener. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 15 cm. Length 20 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook. The keyring is decorated with a small satin bow and a larger imitation leather bow. Length 14 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.

Running gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric, narrow elastication at the top and palms in fast-drying functional fabric. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material. Soft, thermal lining.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with short trumpet sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the bottom. Unlined.
Elf hat in fleece with a faux fur pompom and ears at the sides.

Halterneck jumpsuit in a crêpe weave. Lace back with an open section, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in the side. Pleats at the front, a seam at the waist with a wide band, and wide legs. Satin lining at the top.
Sleeveless top in satin with a layer of sequin-embroidered mesh over the front. Back in a viscose weave with buttons at the back of the neck.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a drawstring V-neck, short sleeves with a seam and flounced trim, and an asymmetric seam at the hem with a flounce.

Set with a short-sleeved polo shirt and pair of shorts with straps in soft, organic cotton jersey. Polo shirt with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and straps with concealed, adjustable buttoning at the front.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.

Straight-cut, double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, front pockets with a decorative flap and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long raglan sleeves with a sewn-on tab at the cuffs, and a box pleat at the back for extra width to the hem. Unlined.
Clamdiggers in washed denim with decorative seams on the legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and a leg pocket.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with appliqués on the front and flounced sleeves that continue down the sides. Shorts with a decorative bow at the front, an elasticated waist with a small frill trim at the top and diagonal side pockets.
Fabric sandals with a rhinestone decoration on the front, and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Insoles in satin made from recycled polyester, and trainer soles.
Short-sleeved top in viscose crêpe with a round neckline and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist. Patterned hairband with a sewn-on bow.

Calf-length dress in jersey with a unique nursing feature, long sleeves and a draped detail at the front. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short skirt in imitation leather. High waist with a press-stud, a diagonal zip down the front, one fake pocket with a flap and press-stud and one real pocket with a zip at the front. Lined.
Metal necklaces decorated with sparkly glass stones. One short necklace and a longer necklace with a long pendant. Adjustable length, 27-38 cm and 38-48 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front and a zip fly with a button. Diagonal front pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, tapered legs.
Calf-length skirt in satin crêpe with a pleated section at one side, a concealed zip in the other side and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

Long dress in an airy weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with a small opening and tie detail at the top. Concealed zip in one side and a seam below the bust with pleats to create width in the skirt. Lined.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and inner jersey ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sandals with covered heels, a twisted detail at the front, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and heel caps. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Socks in a soft, ribbed cotton blend. High shaft with an intarsia design and elasticated tops.
Cardigan in a soft knit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boots in imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with worn details, a fake fly and press-stud at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, buttons at the back, a seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in a textured jacquard weave with a cut-out section at the back and a fastening at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with pleats, and pockets in the side seams. Partly lined.
Metal studs of various sizes. Some pairs with a faceted glass bead and some with plastic beads. Size from 0.3 to 0.9 cm.
